name: Ode to Escher
description: Ode2Esher is a compilation of NY buildings photographed while shooting on upper Madison Ave. New York.  I originally published just the tops of the buildings. Then experimenting with multiples  cutting and pasting the parts into various configurations, a series emerged. After constructing the design;  I used the dodge and burn toolâ€™s for balance.  The gradient tool in PS Raw put emphasis into the shadows and finished the tone of the project.  Ode2Esher is about design and geometrical balance.
